channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Each Cava location is worth a whopping $33 million. Its CEO explains how the Chipotle competitor is achieving explosive growth
item.description: Brett Schulman says the chain’s 300% stock growth is not just due to its crazy feta.

item.title: Wall Street resets rate-cut views with 'soft landing' in sight after jobs report
AI assistants are ratting you out for badmouthing your coworkers
item.description: You shouldn’t give an AI assistant more power than a recent college graduate, C-suite exec suggests.

item.title: Trump holds Pennsylvania rally at same venue of first assassination attempt, joined by Musk, Vance
item.description: Elon Musk spoke at Donald Trump's second Butler rally, marking the latest sign of support in their growing alliance.

item.title: Caffeine may be just the exercise booster you need—as long as you don’t over do it, say experts
item.description: “It’s a great performance enhancer,” one expert says. Here’s why it’s important to use the stimulant responsibly.

item.title: Trump joined by Musk on campaign trail in return to scene of July assassination attempt
item.description: Donald Trump picked up where he left off back in July when a gunman tried to assassinate him but only struck his ear.

item.title: How China's stimulus could provide a boost to new CEOs at Nike and Starbucks down the line
item.description: The new executives are taking over companies that have significant sales exposure to China, but Wall Street is cautious about the impact of the stimul...

item.title: Why Cisco is looking at investing in hot AI startup CoreWeave
Venture capitalist Ben Horowitz says he plans to donate to VP Kamala Harris' campaign
item.description: In an email to Andreessen-Horowitz employees, co-founder Ben Horowitz said he planned to donate to Kamala Harris' campaign for president.

item.title: U.S. stocks end higher after strong jobs report as S&P 500 ekes out weekly gain
Bets that oil will hit $100 a barrel surge on fears of wider Middle Eastern war
MG Cyberster brings open-top fun to electric cars at last
item.description: Fortune took a hands-on drive of this much-hyped EV in the Scottish highlands and the potholed streets of London.

item.title: Kamala Harris buoyed by jobs report, inflation numbers as Election Day nears
Amazon bets on selling cashierless technology to retailers after pulling it from most U.S. stores
item.description: Amazon is selling its cashierless technology called "Just Walk Out" to outside retailers. CNBC gets a behind-the-scenes look at how the technology wor...

item.title: Cheap stocks to buy in the fourth quarter, according to HSBC
item.description: The Wall Street firm is highlighting some stocks that have "less demanding" valuations that investors should consider buying moving into the fourth qu...
